metadata.name: AWS Snapshot Backup Exfiltration
metadata.comment: Detects the modification of an EC2 snapshot's permissions to enable access from another account

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('ec2.amazonaws.com') AND lower(metadata.event_code) = lower('modifysnapshotattribute'))

output.summary: Detects the modification of an EC2 snapshot's permissions to enable access from another account

metadata.objective: False positive: Valid change to a snapshot's permissions Reference: https://www.justice.gov/file/1080281/download
